message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Split it down the middle, Alice. It's only fair.
This is my final offer, Bob.  Let's be reasonable and split it 60/40.  We both get a decent amount and avoid any further inflation.
I'm not willing to give you the lion's share, Alice. This is a fair split.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60. It's better than both of us getting nothing with continued inflation.
I'm not backing down, Alice. I'm willing to take a smaller share to get a bigger chunk of the remaining cash.
